scenario.name: Cisco BiB - simple call
scenario.sendCmd: From: master Call-ID: new_[call_id] New-call: yes
scenario.send: INVITE sip:7777@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Allow: INVITE, OPTIONS, INFO, BYE, CANCEL, ACK, PRACK, UPDATE, REFER, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY Content-Length: 0 Contact: <sip:4062@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]>;isFocus Allow-Events: presence, kpml User-Agent: Cisco-CUCM10.5 Session-Expires: 1800 Cisco-Guid: 0648881792-0000065536-0000001647-0185272330 Privacy: none Expires: 180 P-Asserted-Identity: "Janice Holland" <sip:4062@[local_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 101 INVITE Min-SE: 1800 Date: Thu, 25 Apr 2019 15:02:34 GMT Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] Remote-Party-ID: "Janice Holland" <sip:4062@[local_ip]>;party=calling;screen=yes;privacy=off From: "Janice Holland" <sip:4062@[local_ip];x-farend;x-refci=82731258;x-nearendclusterid=CCM1-Cluster;x-nearenddevice=SEP189C5DB7C8AC;x-nearendaddr=4062;x-farendrefci=82730980;x-farendclusterid=CCM1-Cluster;x-farenddevice=10.1.20.11;x-farendaddr=8172710497>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] Call-Info: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]>;method="NOTIFY;Event=telephone-event;Duration=500" Supported: timer,resource-priority,replaces Supported: X-cisco-srtp-fallback Supported: Geolocation Max-Forwards: 70 To: <sip:7777@[remote_ip]>

ACK sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port];transport=[transport] SIP/2.0 Content-Length: [len] Allow-Events: presence, kpml User-Agent: Cisco-CUCM10.5 Content-Type: application/sdp Privacy: none Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 101 ACK Date: Thu, 25 Apr 2019 15:02:34 GMT Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] From: "Janice Holland" <sip:4062@[local_ip];x-farend;x-refci=82731258;x-nearendclusterid=CCM1-Cluster;x-nearenddevice=SEP189C5DB7C8AC;x-nearendaddr=4062;x-farendrefci=82730980;x-farendclusterid=CCM1-Cluster;x-farenddevice=10.1.20.11;x-farendaddr=8172710497>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:7777@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param]
v=0 o=CiscoSystemsCCM-SIP 512196 1 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=SIP Call c=IN IP4 [local_ip] b=TIAS:64000 b=CT:64 b=AS:64 t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 0 101 a=ptime:20 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=sendonly a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-15

BYE sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port];transport=[transport] SIP/2.0 Content-Length: 0 User-Agent: Cisco-CUCM10.5 Privacy: none P-Asserted-Identity: "Janice Holland" <sip:4062@[local_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 102 BYE Date: Thu, 25 Apr 2019 15:02:34 GMT Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "Janice Holland" <sip:4062@[local_ip];x-farrend;x-refci=82731258;x-nearendclusterid=CCM1-Cluster;x-nearenddevice=SEP189C5DB7C8AC;x-nearendaddr=4062;x-farendrefci=82730980;x-farendclusterid=CCM1-Cluster;x-farenddevice=10.1.20.11;x-farendaddr=8172710497>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] Max-Forwards: 70 To: <sip:7777@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param]
